name: Chinese Frontiers: Prologue
description:
Chinese Frontiers: Prologue is only part of the gameplay that will be available in the full version. Play for FREE and discover what life was like in a Chinese settlement formed during the construction of the Great Wall.

Be one of the villagers and challenge your skills in the construction of the world's largest defensive fortification. Do you think you have what it takes to handle everyday challenges? The introduction to the whole story is available here:


Take care of your quality of life in the village:
- create the necessary tools
- build the most important buildings and infrastructure in the village
- produce machine elements necessary for the construction of the Great Wall


Build a signal tower from scratch:
- arrange all resources
- browse through design plans
- perform various construction work


Survive in good conditions:
- explore the area
- collect food and other products
- learn to cook Chinese food
